channel.title: CVE Feed for bc2018 -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for bc2018 -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-36839|2024-10-16T12:59:54.576Z -- bc2018 -- wordpress%20landing%20page%20%E2%80%93%20squeeze%20page%20%E2%80%93%20responsive%20landing%20page%20builder%20free%20%E2%80%93%20wp%20lead%20plus%20x
item.description: The WP Lead Plus X plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in versions up to, and including, 0.99. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on several functions. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to perform administrative actions, such as adding pages to the site and/or replacing site content with malicious JavaScript via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.

item.title: CVE-2020-36839|2024-10-16T06:43:45.081Z -- bc2018 -- wordpress%20landing%20page%20%E2%80%93%20squeeze%20page%20%E2%80%93%20responsive%20landing%20page%20builder%20free%20%E2%80%93%20wp%20lead%20plus%20x
item.description: The WP Lead Plus X plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in versions up to, and including, 0.99. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on several functions. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to perform administrative actions, such as adding pages to the site and/or replacing site content with malicious JavaScript via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
